alert.note: Alert for Brown; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:09PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rock and southeastern Brown Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 309 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Rose, or 18 miles north of Brewster. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Duff and Johnsons Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
